actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the act of August 25, 1958, as amended (the Former Presidents Act of 1958, 3 U.S.C. Sec. 102, note), by amending provisions relating to former President's staffs.

summary.text: Amends the Former Presidents Act of 1958 by requiring each former president to fix the basic rates of compensation for staff in accordance with specified levels of the Executive and General Schedules.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of August 25, 1958, as amended (the Former Presidents Act of 1958, 3 U.S.C. Sec. 102, note), by amending provisions relating to former President's staffs.
